title: S16 Ep72: Supernatural News/Parashare: When the Dead Call Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: When the Dead Call Edition
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/ParaShare When the Dead Call Edition!

Dave & Tim are back and share some intriguing stories of otherworldly communication, actual ghostly audio left on a voice mail, plus a recent tragedy has strange phenomena reaching out from the great beyond via the phone. The boys also look into Killer Trees, a exorcism at a Home Depot, ghostly sightings, and we answer your email questions and share your stories....PLUS Black Eyed Kids are back!

Donate to help Brett Butler here: https://bit.ly/35Y52FH

Get the books mentioned on todays show here: www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave
